trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **Navigating** event.
trans-unit.target: Fournit des données pour l’événement **Navigating**.

trans-unit.source: These event arguments contain information about the navigation that was requested, and are passed to handlers of the **Navigating** event, which is implemented by the following:
trans-unit.target: Ces arguments d’événement contiennent des informations sur le volet de navigation qui a été demandé et est passé aux gestionnaires de la **Navigating** événement, qui est implémentée par les éléments suivants :

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> encapsulates the following details of the navigation request:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> encapsule les détails suivants de la requête de navigation :

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Initiation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Initiation de la navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Content**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Contenu de la navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation Request**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Demande de navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Navigation State**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **État de la navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This information allows you to both evaluate the nature of the navigation request, and view and update specified request details before navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ces informations vous permettent d’évaluer la nature de la requête de navigation et afficher et mettre à jour les détails de la demande spécifiée avant la navigation.

trans-unit.source: Based on the navigation request information provided by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>, or based on application-specific state or code, you can completely prevent navigation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` (by default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `false`).
trans-unit.target: Selon les informations de requête de navigation fournies par <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs>, ou selon l’état spécifique à l’application ou du code, vous pouvez empêcher la navigation en définissant le <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriété `true` (par défaut, <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> est `false`).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> to detect whether a request to refresh static content was made, and if one was, how to cancel the request.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment gérer les <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> pour détecter si une requête d’actualisation du contenu statique a été effectuée, et si tel est le cas, comment annuler la demande.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the content object that is being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une référence à l'objet de contenu cible de la navigation.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> reference to the content object that is being navigated to; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Référence <see cref="T:System.Object" /> à l'objet de contenu cible de la navigation ; <see langword="null" /> dans le cas contraire.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to content using either a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] or an object.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez accéder au contenu en utilisant un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] ou un objet.

trans-unit.source: When navigating to an object, which occurs when calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> contains a reference to the content object that is being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque vous naviguerez vers un objet, qui se produit lors de l’appel <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> contient une référence à l’objet de contenu en cours de navigation.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: En outre, le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A> propriété sera `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that is associated with the back navigation history entry for the page being navigated from.
trans-unit.target: Obtient et définit l'objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> associé à l'entrée de l'historique de navigation arrière pour la page accédée par la navigation.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that is associated with the back navigation history entry for the page being navigated from.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> associé à l'entrée de l'historique de navigation arrière pour la page accédée par la navigation.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is raised when navigating from one piece of content to another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> événement est déclenché lors de la navigation à partir d’un élément de contenu vers un autre.

trans-unit.source: The content that is being navigated from is added to back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Le contenu de la navigation est ajouté à l’historique de navigation arrière.

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A> with a custom <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object to associate state information with content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez définir <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A> avec un personnalisé <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> objet à associer les informations d’état contenu dans l’historique de navigation.

trans-unit.source: Gets the optional data <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was passed when navigation started.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'<see cref="T:System.Object" /> de données facultatif passé lorsque la navigation a commencé.

trans-unit.source: The optional data <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was passed when navigation started.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> de données facultatif passé lorsque la navigation a commencé.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> can be used to pass context-specific data that is specific to a particular navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> peut être utilisé pour passer des données spécifiques au contexte qui sont spécifiques à une navigation particulière.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> contains a reference to the object that is passed as the second argument when calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> contient une référence à l’objet qui est passé comme deuxième argument lors de l’appel soit <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Sinon, il s'agit de `null`.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the navigator (<see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />) that is specified by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator" /> is servicing this navigation, or whether a parent navigator is doing so.
trans-unit.target: Indique si le navigateur (<see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />) spécifié par <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator" /> entretient cette navigation ou si c'est un navigateur parent qui opère.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that is <see langword="true" /> if the navigator that is specified by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator" /> is servicing this navigation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> de valeur <see langword="true" /> si le navigateur spécifié par <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator" /> entretient cette navigation.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" /> is returned, such as during a nested <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> navigation.
trans-unit.target: Sinon, <see langword="false" /> est retourné, comme lors d'une navigation <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> imbriquée par exemple.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode" /> value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode" /> qui indique le type de navigation en cours.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode" /> value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Valeur <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode" /> qui indique le type de navigation en cours.

trans-unit.source: The types of navigation that can occur are:
trans-unit.target: Les types de navigation qui peuvent se produire sont :

trans-unit.source: Navigating to new content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.New>).
trans-unit.target: Navigation vers le nouveau contenu (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.New>).

trans-unit.source: Navigating to the previous item in back navigation history (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.Back>).
trans-unit.target: Naviguer vers l’élément précédent à l’arrière de l’historique de navigation (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.Back>).

trans-unit.source: Navigating to the next item in forward navigation history (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.Forward>).
trans-unit.target: Accéder à l’élément suivant dans l’historique de navigation vers l’avant (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.Forward>).

trans-unit.source: Refreshing existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.Refresh>).
trans-unit.target: Actualisation du contenu existant (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode.Refresh>).

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: Navigateur qui a déclenché l'événement.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the navigator that raised this event
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> correspondant au navigateur qui a déclenché cet événement.

trans-unit.source: While <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A> stores a reference to the navigator that raised this event, the navigator may not have actually initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: Alors que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A> stocke une référence au navigateur qui a déclenché cet événement, le navigateur peut ne pas avoir réellement lancé le volet de navigation.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether this navigator did initiate the current navigation, inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pour déterminer si ce navigateur a lancé la navigation en cours, examinez le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A> propriété.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that is to be applied to the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> à appliquer au contenu cible de navigation.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that is to be applied to the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> à appliquer au contenu cible de navigation.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A> will contain a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object if navigating to content in back or forward navigation history that has a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A> contient un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> si l’accès à du contenu à l’arrière de l’objet ou l’avant dans l’historique de navigation qui a un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> objet associé.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] du contenu cible de la navigation.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> du contenu cible de la navigation.

trans-unit.source: If navigating to an object, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Lors de la navigation vers un objet, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri" /> a la valeur <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to content using either an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] or an object.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez accéder au contenu en utilisant un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] ou un objet.

trans-unit.source: When navigating to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], which occurs when calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A> contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque vous naviguerez vers une [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], qui se produit lors de l’appel <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> et <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A> contient le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] du contenu de la cible de la navigation.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: En outre, le <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> propriété sera `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> object that is used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> utilisé pour effectuer une requête sur le contenu spécifié.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> object that is used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> utilisé pour effectuer une requête sur le contenu spécifié.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> is an abstract base class that encapsulates a Web request, and is protocol agnostic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> est une classe de base abstraite qui encapsule une requête Web, et n’est pas du protocole.

trans-unit.source: For each common protocol, the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] includes a class that derives from <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> and extends it with protocol specific state and behavior, including:
trans-unit.target: Pour chaque protocole commun, le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] inclut une classe qui dérive de <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=nameWithType> et les étend avec un état spécifique de protocole et le comportement, notamment :

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `pack://` schéma de la requête de fichiers de données d’application (consultez [ressource d’Application WPF, contenu et les fichiers de données](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `http://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs Web.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `ftp://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs FTP.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `file://` schéma pour demander des fichiers locaux.

trans-unit.source: You can both view and modify <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> details.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez afficher et modifier <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> détails.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.WebRequest%2A> is `null` when navigation occurs by:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.WebRequest%2A> est `null` lorsque la navigation se produit par :

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: À l’aide de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> contrôle.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>
trans-unit.target: L’appel <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Paramètre <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Navigating through HTML content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: Navigation dans le contenu HTML dans un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
